thread.title: Penn pulls out victory over Mishawaka
thread.title_full: Penn pulls out victory over Mishawaka

author: Al Lesar South Bend Tribune
title: Penn pulls out victory over Mishawaka
text:
Previous Next Penn pulls out victory over Mishawaka 
Penn senior quarterback Camden Bohn tries to gain a few more yards as Mishawaka’s Blake Becker and Luke Shively make the tackle during their game Friday at Mishawaka High School’s Steele Stadium. SBT Photo/ BECKY MALEWITZ Penn pulls out victory over Mishawaka 
Mishawaka’s Samuel Eggleston and Jon Derolus celebrate a touchdown during the first half of the match up against Penn Friday at Mishawaka High School’s Steele Stadium. SBT Photo/ BECKY MALEWITZ Posted: Saturday, October 17, 2015 6:00 am | Updated: 6:42 am, Sat Oct 17, 2015. Penn pulls out victory over Mishawaka By Al Lesar South Bend Tribune SouthBendTribune.com Posted on Oct 17, 2015 
MISHAWAKA — Bottle this. Save it for the next six or so weeks. 
And Penn and Mishawaka will represent area high school football well in the state tournament. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
